title: Vaibhav Laxmi Grand Diamond Haaram with Emerald and Sapphire Drops
materials: meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
E-F Color). Features vibrant Emeralds (Zambian Origin) and captivating Sapphire drops with gold caps. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A breathtaking statement piece boasting intricate filigree work and a traditional South Indian floral design. The central pendant features a prominent Emerald, surrounded by cascading diamond-studded motifs. Sapphire drops add a touch of regal elegance. Expertly crafted using Nakshi techniques for a timeless appeal.
colors: Primarily gold and dazzling white (diamonds) accented by vivid green Emeralds
and deep blue Sapphires. The contrast creates a rich and luxurious aesthetic.
occasions: and other significant celebrations. An ideal choice for brides seeking a traditional yet sophisticated look
especially for muhurtham and seemantham ceremonies.
description: A true heirloom piece showcasing exceptional craftsmanship and luxurious materials. The intricate detailing, combined with the brilliance of the diamonds and the vibrancy of the gemstones, makes it a timeless investment. Its traditional design and cultural significance make it a cherished piece for generations. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, embodying the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry.
